snippet.title: Otosan Game Trailer #1
snippet.description:
Play the demo: https://otsn.cc/demo/
Soundtrack: https://otsn.cc/album/

Otosan is an all-new adventure inspired by EarthBound, Final Fantasy VI, and Chrono Trigger. I hope that this story can deliver a little bit of happiness to you. It is presented free of charge, and free of ads.

https://www.otosan-game.com/
